 = \frac{ 7 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{3 } \right ) + 5 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{2 }{3 } \right) + 2 }

export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If \(i : j = 2 : 3 \), then find \((7 i + 5 j ):(3 i + 2 j )\)
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": " 
 It is given that 
\[
 i : j = 2 : 3 
\]
We need to find the value of 
\[
 \frac{\input[s1v1]{} i + 5 j }{3 i + \input[s1v2]{} j }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ \frac{7 i }{j } + \input[s2v1]{} }{\frac{\input[s2v2]{} i }{j } + 2 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{ 7 \left (\frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{3 } \right ) + 5 }{\input[s3v2]{} \left(\frac{2 }{3 } \right) + 2 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\frac{\input[s4v1]{} + 15 }{3 }}{\frac{\input[s4v2]{} + 6 }{3 }}
\]
\[
 = \frac{14 + 15 }{6 + 6 }
\]
 "}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 1, "step_txt": "
 \[
 = \frac{\input[s5v1]{} }{12 }
\]

 "}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
 So, the answer is $29 : 12 $
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [7, 2], "text": " $$ \text{Please refer back to the question.} $$ 
 "}, {"data": [5, 3], "text": " $$ \text{Dividing numerator and denominator by j, we get the expression} \frac{ \frac{7 i }{j } + 5 }{\frac{3 i }{j } + 2 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [2, 3], "text": " $$ \text{Substitute the given ratio of } i:j = 2:3 {, to get the expression}\frac{ 7 \left (\frac{2 }{3 } \right ) + 5 }{3 \left(\frac{2 }{3 } \right) + 2 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [14, 6], "text": " 
 $$ \text{We take LCM's to get the expression} \frac{\frac{14 + 15 }{3 }}{\frac{6 + 6 }{3 }}
, \text{after which multiplying both numerator and denomiator by} 2 \text{, we get} \frac{14 + 15 }{6 + 6 } $$ 
 "}, {"data": [29], "text": " 
 $$ \text{ Upon further simplification we get the following answer} \frac{29 }{12 }. $$"}, {"data": [], "text": "
 "}]
